t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The tower must be around here.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will keep going until I find it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You should turn back because your search won't be easy.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll be here to stay you piece of filth.
